item.title: Colour yell system
item.dc:creator: @goldstylez goldstylez
item.description:
@goldstylez wrote:

i want to get a colourfull yell system… but what i have to do?

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }

I was thinking about this( but gives 100 errors):

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@gre@ [Moderator] ";
            }

but ingame it says: @gre@ [Moderator] myname: text…

Read full topic
